citation: Proclamation under the Forestry (Rebuilding the Forest Industry) Act 2014 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Forestry (Rebuilding the Forest Industry) Act 2014

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Forestry (Rebuilding the Forest Industry) Act 2014 fix 22 October 2014 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

13 October 2014

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

PAUL HARRISS

Minister for Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 October 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
